壾字的基本解释

壾
mǎng
古人名用字。

壾字的汉语字典释义

[①]［mǎng］
［《廣韻》模朗切，上蕩，明。］
人名用字。三国吴王孫休所造。

壾字的康熙字典解释

【丑集中】【士字部】　壾； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页244第09
【類篇】母朗切，音莽。孫休第三子名壾，見【三國吳志】。　【篇韻】作?。【字彙】作?，音祿，?誤。?字从?，不从去作。

壾字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
壾字的起名意思

古人名用字。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［mǎng］
["Guangyun" is modelled and cut, up and down, and bright. ]
Use characters for names. Made by Sun Xiu, King Wu of the Three Kingdoms.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Ugly Collection] [Shizi Department] 　壾; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 244 09
[Classes] Mother Langqie, sound mang. The third son of Sun Xiu is named Yu, see 【Three Kingdoms Wu Zhi】.　【Pian Yun】make?. [Vocabulary] For?, Yinlu,? Wrong. "The word is from?", but not from where to write.
